entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
